official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain land to the land to the Edward H. McDaniel American Legion Post No. 22 in Pahrump, Nevada, for the construction of a post building and memorial park for use by the American Legion, other veterans' groups, and the local community.
short_title: Edward H. McDaniel American Legion Post No. 22 Land Conveyance Act

summary.text: Edward H. McDaniel American Legion Post No. 22 Land Conveyance Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the Edward H. McDaniel American Legion Post No. 22 in Pahrump, Nevada, specified federal lands in Nevada for the construction of a post building and memorial park for use by Post No. 22, other veterans groups, and the local community for events and activities.

titles.title: Edward H. McDaniel American Legion Post No. 22 Land Conveyance Act
Edward H. McDaniel American Legion Post No. 22 Land Conveyance Act
Edward H. McDaniel American Legion Post No. 22 Land Conveyance Act

A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain land to the land to the Edward H. McDaniel American Legion Post No. 22 in Pahrump, Nevada, for the construction of a post building and memorial park for use by the American Legion, other veterans' groups, and the local community.
